developer.name: GlassLab, Inc.
developer.description:
GlassLab brings together leaders in commercial games and experts in learning and assessment to develop next generation digital games and interactive experiences that make learning visible. Our products and services are designed to deliver proven learning impact and reach youth in schools, informal learning environments, and at home.

The Lab represents a groundbreaking collaboration between Educational Testing Service, Electronic Arts, the Entertainment Software Association, Institute of Play, Pearson's Center for Digital Data, Analytics & Adaptive Learning, Zynga, and others.

GlassLab is made possible through the generous support of The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation and The John D. and Catherine T. MacArthur Foundation.

wo1.name: Trouble with Gameplay Knowledge
wo1.description: The player may not understand how the game works - they needed four or more attempts to finish one or more of the introductory challenges.

wo2.name: Trouble with Shipping Activities
wo2.description: The player has experienced multiple failures when shipping creatures.

wo3.name: Trouble Feeding Creatures
wo3.description: The player has experienced multiple failures when feeding creatures.

wo4.name: Trouble with Early Skills
wo4.description: Player has been unsuccessful two or more times when working with easier ratio-challenge types: ND types.

wo5.name: Trouble with Early Skills
wo5.description: Player has been unsuccessful two or more times when working with easier ratio-challenge types: MD types.

wo6.name: Trouble with Early Skills
wo6.description: Player has been unsuccessful two or more times when working with complex ratio-challenge types: MS types.

wo7.name: Trouble with Complex Skills
wo7.description: Player has been unsuccessful two or more times when working with complex ratio-challenge types: NS types.

wo8.name: Trouble with Advanced Skills
wo8.description: Difficulty with "advanced" skills: player has been unsuccessful working with advanced problem types: MT types.

so1.name: Good Gameplay Knowledge
so1.description: The player knows how to play the game and use it's features.

so2.name: Successful Feeding!
so2.description: The player successfully fed their first pen of creatures.

so3.name: Successful Shipment!
so3.description: This player has successfully made their first shipment of creatures.

so4.name: Success with Early Skills
so4.description: Player successfully completed the first two challenge types on their first attempt.

so5.name: Success with Complex Skills
so5.description: Player successfully completed the second two challenge types on their first attempt.

so6.name: Success with Advanced Skills
so6.description: Player successfully completed the first advanced challenge type on their first attempt.

so7.name: Early Mastery!
so7.description: Master performance! The player has completed Part I and Part II of the game without any mistakes!

so8.name: Completed Advanced Challenges!
so8.description: Super performance! This player successfully completed one or more advanced level challenges.

list.description: This report provides a snapshot of how students are doing right now. Celebrate your students' success (Shout Out!) and intervene with those students in need of help (Watch Out!).
